main event: On 24 July 1949, an observer flying his airplane near Mountain Home, Idaho, sighted seven unidentified flying objects flying in a V formation.
interesting points: The objects were described as delta wing shapes, larger than a P-51, observed flying at between 6500 and 10,000 feet altitude,The observer noted the objects made a sharp 180Â° turn while maintaining stable flight without banking,The speed of the objects was estimated to be faster than an F-51, approximately 600 miles per hour or more,The observer experienced engine issues immediately following the sighting, and discovered that seven of eight spark plugs had been burned out,The sighting lasted for about 1-2 minutes before the objects disappeared suddenly from view.
sighted object: seven delta wing shaped flying objects in a V formation
witness description: The observer was a pilot with civilian flying experience amounting to over 12,000 hours.
